patch.data:
• Desecrated Ground (E)
    • The cooldown of this ability has been changed to 12 seconds at all ranks, from 14/13/12/11/10.
    • The range of this ability has been reduced to 850, down from 900.
    • The damage of this ability has been adjusted to 75/115/155/195/235, from 70/115/160/205/250.
  • Death Fog (R)
    • The cooldown of this ultimate ability has been increased to 120/110/100, up from 100/90/80.

• Passive - Steadfast
    • The Armor and Magic Resist ratios on this passive ability have been removed. The amount healed is now equal to 10 + (1.5 * Level). This effect is doubled against Shapers.
    • The cooldown of this passive ability has been increased to 6 seconds, up from 5.
  • Wisdom's Reach (R)
    • The cooldown of this ultimate ability has been increased to 150/130/110, up from 130/115/100.
    • The damage of this ultimate ability has been reduced to 150/225/300, down from 150/235/320.

• Renzo's Embrace (W)
    • The amount shielded by this ability has been increased to 65/115/165/215/265, up from 60/105/150/195/240.
  • Masterpiece (R)
    • The knock-up duration of this ultimate ability has been increased to 1 second, up from 0.85.

• Recommended items have been updated.
  • Grievous Wounds (W)
    • The base percentage max health damage of this ability has been increased to 3/3.5/4/4.5/5%, up from 2/2.5/3/3.5/4%.
    • The duration of this ability when activated has been increased to 8 seconds, up from 7.
  • Jagged Volley (E)
    • The cooldown of this ability has been reduced to 14/13/12/11/10 seconds, down from 18/16/15/12/10.
  • Splintering Spines (R)
    • The tooltip for this ability has been updated to show the exact amount of damage the splash of this ability will do, rather than displaying it only as a percentage of your attack damage.
    • The duration of this ability when activated has been increased to 8 seconds, up from 7.
• The increased movement speed duration granted by this Spell has been reduced to 6 seconds, down from 8.
• Fixed a bug that allowed Fenmore to get credit for his own deaths.
• Fixed a bug that was causing this item's passive ability not to work in certain circumstances.
• Fixed a bug that was causing this item's passive ability not to work in certain circumstances.
• Fixed a bug that caused the chat box to fade out if chat populates while in the process of typing.
